short_summary: bridge infrastructure support with Category NSB
description: Replacement of superstructure and reinforcement of abutment walls on Poboktan Creek Bridge, 93N - Jasper National Park. The estimated value is between 1,000,000 $ and 5,000,000 $ taxes extra.
full_summary:
### Pobokton Creek Bridge Rehabilitation, Jasper National Park

**Tender Information**

* **Reference Number**: cb-508-33052625
* **Solicitation Number**: 5P468-23-0339/A
* **Tender Closing Date**: May 15, 2024, 04:00:00 PM MDT-HNR

**Project Overview**

Parks Canada Agency requires the replacement of the superstructure and reinforcement of abutment walls on Pobokton Creek Bridge, located in Jasper National Park. The project is estimated to be valued between $1,000,001 and $5,000,000, including taxes.

**Application and Submission Guidelines**

Bids must be submitted electronically via email or fax to the designated authorities. Bidders are required to ensure their submissions are received by the specified closing date and time. Late submissions will not be accepted.

**Bidder Conference**

A bidder conference will be held via teleconference on April 24, 2024, at 2:00 PM MDT-HNR. Attendance is recommended to clarify project requirements and resolve questions.

**Accommodations for Indigenous Communities**

Bidders are required to provide specific socioeconomic benefits to Indigenous communities within the contract area. The Contractor Selection and Indigenous Participation Plan is outlined in the Invitation to Tender.

**Security Requirements and Contractual Obligations**

There are no security requirements applicable to this contract. The duration of the contract is from May 2024 to October 2025.

**Technical and Contractual Enquiries**

All enquiries must be submitted to the Contracting Authority in writing and received no later than five (5) business days prior to the closing date.

**Additional Information**

Upon request, Parks Canada will provide equivalent documents in both official languages of Canada. Should any discrepancies arise, please inform the Contracting Authority to enable resolution.

For detailed project specifications and drawings, kindly refer to the Government Electronic Tendering Service at [www.canadabuys.canada.ca/fr/occasions-de-marche](http://www.canadabuys.canada.ca/fr/occasions-de-marche). Late submissions will not be taken into consideration. L’État se réserve le droit de négocier avec les fournisseurs les conditions de tout marché.  (Translation: The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on procurement terms.)

Please direct all technical and contractual enquiries to the sporting authorities for proper resolution. 

_The Crown / Ministère_. 

---
